mean_cn: n. 党羽；虔诚信徒；  adj. 偏袒的；盲目推崇的
mean_en: a member of an armed group that is fighting secretly against enemy soldiers who have taken control of its country
sentence: These two partisans attempt to cooperate with each other rather than competing.
sentence_trans: 这两个党派尝试着合作而非竞争。
word_etyma: partis=party党 + an表示人 → 党人 → partisan党羽，党派的
